about_the_game:
This content adds the new, higher resolution* Darius Odyssey digital guidebook to your game.
*Screenshots show min & max zoom.

The Darius Odyssey guidebook includes over 170 pages of illustrations, ship designs, concept art, stage route diagrams, interviews, and comics from the entire Darius series.
The CA (Chara-Ani) version is updated with 16 new pages exclusive to this edition, including data on DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours, exclusive rough art from past games and a 6 page comic.

You can access the Darius Odyssey guidebook via the Options menu in DARIUSBURST CS. You will need DARIUSBURST CS installed in order to access the guidebook.
Important note: The Odyssey guidebook is provided in Japanese language only.
detailed_description:
Important Note

The DARIUS ODYSSEY content is only provided with Japanese text.


About the Game

*Screenshots show min & max zoom.

The Darius Odyssey guidebook includes over 170 pages of illustrations, ship designs, concept art, stage route diagrams, interviews, and comics from the entire Darius series.
The CA (Chara-Ani) version is updated with 16 new pages exclusive to this edition, including data on DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours, exclusive rough art from past games and a 6 page comic.

You can access the Darius Odyssey guidebook via the Options menu in DARIUSBURST CS. You will need DARIUSBURST CS installed in order to access the guidebook.
Important note: The Odyssey guidebook is provided in Japanese language only.

package_groups.title: Buy DARIUSBURST Chronicle Saviours - Darius Odyssey Digital Guidebook

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo E6400
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Compatible, GeForce 8600GT
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended, Monitor over 1280x720 px, refresh rate over 60Hz not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: Shader Model 2.0 Compatible, GeForce GT260X or better
  • Additional Notes: Controllers: XInput and DirectInput (Xbox or similar button layout) controllers are supported. XInput controllers are recommended. ** DirectInput controllers with more or fewer buttons might not have an ideal layout. ** Analog Stick buttons (pressing the sticks inward) are not recognized. - - - Dual Monitors: To use dual-screen mode, 2 monitors supporting 1920x1080 are necessary. It is possible to use monitors with a higher resolution, but 2 monitors set to 1920x1080 are recommended. ** Monitors with less than 1080 pixels in vertical resolution are not supported. ** Dual monitors are only supported for AC Mode.

short_description: Adds the Official Darius Odyssey book (in Japanese) to the game with new, high resolution scans. Enjoy illustrations, boss and ship designs, and concept art from the entire Darius series.
